MediaStreamGetVideoTracks.summary:
The getVideoTracks() method of the
interface returns a sequence of
objects representing the video tracks in this stream.
MediaStreamGetVideoTracks.returns:
An array of objects, one for each video track contained
in the media stream. Video tracks are those tracks whose
property is video. The array
is empty if the stream contains no video tracks.
NOTENote: The order of the tracks is not defined by the specification,
and may not be the same from one call to getVideoTracks() to another.
